  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.simpligility.maven.plugins.android.phase09package.ApklibMojo

    com.simpligility.maven.plugins.android.configuration.Manifest
    Use ManifestMerger ManifestMerger in combination with ManifestMergerMojo
